mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Manual of the rattans of the Malay Peninsula. Malayan Forest Recirds 29.

mods:originInfo.mods:publisher: Forest Department, Ministry of Primary Industries, Malaysia

div.p: Differs from the typical form in having broader leaflets, ovoid rather than rounded fruit, and oblong rather than rounded seed. This is a robust mountain rattan, found on G. Padang in Trengganu. There is only one collection and the status of this variety may have to be reviewed if more material becomes available.
